sect1.title: Simple Example
sect1.para: Plainly create a Hyphenator-Object via the factory-method and invoke its hyphenate-method.
It will be hard to make it more simple.

sect1.title: Simple example with non-standard Hyphenator-Home-folder
sect1.para: Of course the Hyphenators home-folder has to be available in the given location and has to be writeable to hte user executing the hyphenator (normaly the webserver-user).
